Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Protective Agent/Chelating Agent/Sodium Gluconate
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: The sodium salt of gluconic acid with chelating property. Sodium gluconate chelates and forms stable complexes with various ions, preventing them from engaging in chemical reactions.
